author: Андрій Русанов
title: Smartwatches can be harmful to health — scientists advise to use silicone straps
text:
Smartwatches and fitness trackers are bought to keep tabs on health, but they could potentially make it worse. It’s all about the strap.
Wrist devices might pose a health threat due to high levels of PFHxA, a chemical found in the fluorinated rubber of premium bands. Devices could expose owners to harmful “forever chemicals.” A study published on December 18 in the journal ACS Environmental Science & Technology Letters, found that more expensive bands made from fluorinated synthetic rubber contained high levels of perfluorohexanoic acid (PFHxA).
Per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) are a group of chemicals that do two things really well: they stick around in the environment almost forever and repel water, sweat, and grease. That’s why manufacturers include these chemicals in many consumer products—stain-resistant bedding, menstrual products, fitness apparel, and notably, smartwatch bands.
The rubber contains fluoroelastomers, synthetic rubbers made with PFAS to prevent discoloration and repel dirt. They can also be a source of compounds that get under the user’s skin. Thus, Graham Peaslee, lead author of the study, and Alissa Wix with Heather Whitehead, funded by the University of Notre Dame, investigated several commercially available watch straps for the presence of fluorine, as well as 20 separate PFAS.
The team tested 22 bands from various brands across different price ranges: most were newly purchased, but some were already worn. Bands costing over $30 contained more fluorine than those priced under $15. Then, after chemical extraction, all bands were tested for 20 different kinds of PFAS. PFHxA turned out to be the most common and was found in nine of the 22 tested bands. The average concentration of PFHxA was nearly 800 parts per billion (ppb), with one sample exceeding 16,000 ppb. For comparison, previous studies of cosmetics conducted by the team in 2023 found an average PFAS concentration of about 200 ppb.
Researchers speculate that the large amount of PFHxA found in bands could be due to the use of the compound as a surfactant during the production of fluoroelastomers. A significant percentage could pass through human skin under normal conditions. Scientists emphasize that further research is needed to elucidate the health impact of PFHxA. Until the issue is more thoroughly investigated, they recommend using cheaper silicone bands.
Source: SciTechDaily

author: base-structure-article.css
title: Em crise, Boeing enfrenta primeira greve de peso em 16 anos e promete continuar negociações - Notícias - BOL
text:
Em crise, Boeing enfrenta primeira greve de peso em 16 anos e promete continuar negociações 13/09/2024 09h35
Os funcionários da Boeing da região de Seattle, nos Estados Unidos, votaram a favor de uma greve nesta sexta-feira (13), rejeitando o acordo proposto pelo construtor americano, que prometeu dar continuidade às negociações.
Segundo Jon Holden, presidente do sindicato 'International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM) Distrito 751', 94,6% dos trabalhadores rejeitaram o acordo e cerca de 96% votaram a favor da greve, na noite desta quinta-feira (12).
"Nossos membros falaram alto e claro esta noite", disse. "O movimento começa às 7h desta sexta-feira", declarou. O sindicato representa cerca de 33.000 trabalhadores na região noroeste do Pacífico, que inicialmente apoiou o acordo.
A greve resultará no fechamento temporário de duas grandes fábricas de montagem de aeronaves na área de Puget Sound, no noroeste do Estado de Washington.
A interrupção paralisará a produção dos modelos comerciais 737, 777 e 767, cujas entregas já estão atrasadas. A situação é problemática porque o fabricante de aeronaves cobra cerca de 60% na entrega das aeronaves, arcando com boa parte dos custos.
Apesar da votação a favor da greve, o grupo Boeing disse em um comunicado que a empresa que manter as negociações. "Continuamos comprometidos a melhorar nosso relacionamento com nossos funcionários e o sindicato. Estamos prontos para voltar à mesa de negociações e chegar a um novo acordo".
Uma greve de 50 dias pode custar à Boeing de US$ 3 bilhões a US$ 3,5 bilhões e teria um impacto de US$ 5,5 bilhões na receita.
A votação de quinta-feira marca a rejeição decisiva ao acordo que os funcionários consideram "menos generoso" do que a Boeing afirma.
Situação financeira precária O acordo, que beneficiaria apenas os funcionários da região de Seattle (noroeste), previa o aumento salarial de 25% em quatro anos e um compromisso com investimentos na região.
Ele também prevê a construção da próxima aeronave - anunciada para 2035 - em Seattle, o deveria gerar empregos por várias décadas. Na última greve em 2008, a Boeing esperava que essas concessões fossem suficientes para evitar uma paralisação.
A situação financeira do construtor é precária desde a queda de dois 737 MAX 8s em 2018 e 2019, que custou a vida de 346 pessoas.
"Não é segredo que nossa empresa está passando por um momento difícil, em parte por causa de nossos próprios erros no passado. (...) Uma greve colocaria em risco nossa recuperação comum", alertou a nova CEO Kelly Ortberg na noite de quarta-feira. Ela sucedeu Dave Calhoun em 8 de agosto.
A presidente da Boeing pediu aos funcionários que não "sacrificassem" o futuro devido a "frustrações com o passado". Mas alguns empregados consideram o aumento salarial muito aquém das demandas do sindicato (+40% inicialmente) e a questão previdenciária insatisfatória.
Uma semana depois de assumir o cargo, Ortberg prometeu "redefinir" o relacionamento com o sindicato. Mas quando o acordo foi lido, muitos membros do reagiram negativamente e imploraram por uma paralisação do trabalho.
"Fomos vendidos" "Fomos vendidos", disse à AFP na quinta-feira Kamie Bryan, funcionária da Boeing há 18 anos, depois de votar contra o acordo e a favor da greve. "Não devemos aceitar esses poucos centavos que eles nos dão e ser gratos", disse ela.
"Eles estão falando sobre um aumento de 25%, mas esse não é o caso", disse Paul Janousek, um eletricista de Everett que votou a favor da greve depois de dizer que a apresentação da Boeing era "enganosa". Janousek, 55, que está na Boeing há 13 anos, disse que o aumento seria de apenas 9%, incluindo a extinção do bônus anual.
As regras do sindicato estabelecem que os grevistas recebem US$ 250 por semana a partir da terceira semana de paralisação.

author: Aspirina99
title: #45 Un atentado islamista durante la misa de Navidad deja más de 160 cristianos asesinados en Nigeria
text:
[Expat_Guinea_Ecuatorial](/user/Expat_Guinea_Ecuatorial)a [gaceta.es](/go/link/3891432) [#0](c0#c-0) Ese titular es tendencioso y confuso, y probablemente seas consciente. El ataque no fue durante una misa, como quiere dar a entender, si no que se atacó una serie de aldeas de manera coordinada. Y además, el factor religioso no es el único relevante, y tampoco está plenamente confirmado.
Hay fuentes mucho más serias, informadas y rigurosas que la que has mandado...
[#10](c10#c-10) Resulta difícil creer que puedan existir fuentes más serias leyendo maravillas cosas como:
La reciente matanza sucedida en Navidad confirma lo que anuncian las estadísticas: el cristianismo es la religión más perseguida en el mundo. Y no se limita solamente a esta región de África, sino que ocurre en Asia y Medio Oriente. Hace poco a cristianos perseguidos por el régimen comunista chino se les negó asilo en la España de Pedro Sánchez y el PSOE. Solo una lo pudo obtener porque su salud le impedía subir al avión donde la deportaban.
Todo ello, mientras las pateras siguen llegando a España, posiblemente con insurgentes tan radicales como los que masacran a los cristianos en Nigeria y sin el amparo para los cristianos que huyen de estos.
[#9](c9#c-9) bueno. Entérate quién financio al valeroso pueblo de Afganistán y sus valerosos guerreros los muyahidines( les dedicaron Rambo iii y todo), o quien armó y financio a Irak, a estos que ves ahora este terrible atentado de la noticia, quien los organizo y financió, ... Después nos vuelves a contar estás cosas. Y si sigues pensando que está irán detrás de todo pq es omnipresente vale. Si ves q algún otro estado puede estar implicado, fijate quién lo arma y financia. Un saludo.
[#13](c13#c-13) lo se y lo he criticado 100 millones de veces, dinero de EEUU y Arabia Saudita y Pakistán.
Pero eso no les importa para llamarlos partisanos, "que en Europa les habría llamado partisanos y que habrían luchado contra los nazis"
Eso es mierda, el fanatismo religioso no atiende a razones.
Al menos tu comentario muestra algo de vergüenza de esa gente... Algo es algo.
[#20](c20#c-20) pues mira otra vez la captura que mandas, pq es exactamente lo que estoy diciendo. Afganistán era un país más adelantado que España y las mujeres iban sin velo. El tío Sam puso a la derecha religiosa conservadora, o lo que viene a ser los fascistas de toda la vida, pero en musulmán, a levantarse en armas... Cómo en Irak, libia, Egipto, Ucrania... Mismo proceder en todos lados, mismo resultado en todos lados. Países de mierda con gobiernos autoritarios y la población paupérrima y reprimida. Eso es el tío Sam.
[#30](c30#c-30) Claro, Afganistan era un paraiso...
https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guerra_de_Afganist%C3%A1n_(1978-1992))
Tienes una vision de la historia bastante distorsionada. China tambien dio armas a los talibanes para luchar contra la URSS, entre otros tantos paises....
Claaaaaaro, todo culpa del tio sam...
[#31](c31#c-31) entérate lo que era Afganistán antes del 92.
Era un estado laico. En el año 90 la mayoría del profesorado eran mujeres, por ejemplo, que estaba integrada en el mundo laboral.
Y la revolución hostigada por el tío Sam puso a los integristas islámicos. Los valerosos muyahidines, como dijeron en Rambo 3, que les dedicaron.
Infórmate tú un poquito, antes de hablar sin saber.
[#32](c32#c-32) tengo entendido dos cosas : Rambo III estaba dedicada a “the galant people of Afghanistan” , lo otro es un bulo . Pero la info en internet se contradice en todas partes acerca de esto , asi que no sé.
Segundo:
Lo de que Afghanistan era laico , mujeres sin velo etc . se ha mostrado erróneo, solo era en Khabul . En las zonas agrarias (el resto del país) era anticuado respecto a esto .
Pero es un lío y al final no sabes lo que es verdad o no , internet está lleno de información contradictoria .
Mira, igual en que en Gaza, pero estos no lo llaman masacre.

https://es.zenit.org/2023/12/12/22-cristianos-muertos-en-gaza-cohete-sin-detonar-hallado-en-parroquia/

[#18](c18#c-18) otro comentario más de "la culpa es de todos menos de la yihad y los países de mierda donde reina la sharia"
Hoy te estás coronado máquina.
Que lastima que estes aquí criticando a occidente para tapar mierdas de asesinos fanatizados y no allí al revés como los verdaderos mártires que si luchan por denunciar atrocidades de países islámicos, ahí veríamos lo valiente que eres con tu reinvidicacion de sofa y tu bandera nazi con la israelí en la foto de perfil.

yo no financie a nadie, manipulador de pacotilla. Típico de esos de la bandera de tu perfil.
Muestras muchos decíamos que la primavera árabe está plagado de fanáticos religiosos que apoyaban las reveliones, tantos otros decían que "callate, hacen lo que deberíamos estar haciendo en Europa, es una revolución". [#9](c9#c-9) ¿En qué parte de su comentario dice eso? "no son culpables de sus actos" y toda la mierda que sigue. O qué parte de su comentario te ha llevado a esa conclusión, si es que necesitas algo más de margen.
Aunque es posible que esa respuesta no tenga nada que ver con su comentario y simplemente sea una patética y lamentable pataleta porque no te ha gustado su respuesta.
[#17](c17#c-17) "por no sé que historia".
¿O por "no quiero saber"? Te dan la oportunidad de aprender, no la desperdicies.

1* las atrocidades de grupos islamistas radicales, no como tantos aquí que aprendieron que eran los talibanes hace 2 meses y ahora los llaman partisanos. Asesinos es su nombre, como es el del gobierno de irán o Arabia Saudita ente otros.
2* crítico a los que claramente ocultan y defienden a estos asesinos bajo un pretexto de victimismo en Palestina.
Un terrorista es un terrorista y lo es con 0 muertos en Palestina y con un millón de muertos.
[#27](c27#c-27) 1a parte todo bien. Segunda, ya no tanto ¿Cómo que terrorista se es y punto?
¿Crees de verdad que si a esta gente nadie estuviera tocándole los huevos en su casa harían lo mismo?

Estos son los que en Francia, España e Italia eran llamados partisanos por que no se que mierdas de las circunstancias? O estos los podemos llamar terroristas?
La yihad se lleva a cabo con muerte de infieles y el miedo a serlo.
No se trata de liberar nada, cada ataque sirve para atraer radicales y causar estragos en los no creyetes.

https://es.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archivo:Reagan_sitting_with_people_from_the_Afghanistan-Pakistan_region_in_February_1983.jpg
[#8](c8#c-8) bajo ninguna circunstancia son culpables de sus actos, siempre es otro, la culpa siempre será de EEUU, de UK, de la sociedad, de la Bernarda, pero nunca ellos y su fanatismo religioso serán los culpables para vosotros.
Vuestra fijación por defender o tapar cada asesino terrorista con escusas es repugnante y os rebaja como... Voy a decir seres humanos.
Es decir para vosotros el fanatismo islámico viene de un supuesto apoyo de EEUU a hamas y no de irán...

Los talibanes son partisanos radicalizados por EEUU.

Pero jamás lobbys, poderes y dinero de países radicales apoyan a estos grupos de mierda.
Así es vuestro mundo.

A quien coño quieres dar lecciones?
EEUU: apoyo yihadistas para quitarse de en medio a un enemigo común.
Tu: apoyas yihadistas para quitarte de en medio un enemigo común.
Eso que tienes ahí llamando nazis es la bandera de Israel no? Imagino que no eres simpatizante, pues eso.
La única deferencia entre EEUU y vosotros es que a EEUU sólo le movía la política, a vosotros os pierde el fanatismo.
Sabes lo que más me revienta de vosotros? Que no vais a ser vosotros quien caiga en esa oscuridad por vuestra culpa.
Habrá niños de 15 que se sentirán libertadores, partisanos, defensores poniendo bombas para un estado islámico por vuestra culpa y vuestros comentarios.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 金融ETF（159931）跌0.85%，半日成交额29.97万元|金融ETF_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，金融ETF（159931）跌0.85%，报1.872元，成交额29.97万元。金融ETF（159931）重仓股方面， 中国平安 截止午盘跌0.93%， 招商银行 跌0.70%， 兴业银行 跌0.08%， 东方财富 跌2.19%， 中信证券 跌1.55%， 工商银行 涨0.14%， 国泰海通 跌0.65%， 交通银行 涨0.13%， 农业银行 涨0.17%， 江苏银行 涨0.68%。
金融ETF（159931）业绩比较基准为 ，管理人为汇添富基金管理股份有限公司，基金经理为晏阳，成立（2013-08-23）以来回报为91.16%，近一个月回报为3.05%。

author: Nibandh Vinod
title: World Animal Day 2024: Theme, History, Significance, Quotes, and Interesting Facts - News18
text:
Animals, much like humans and plants, are vital to our ecosystem. They contribute in numerous ways that are integral to maintaining ecological balance. From regulating ecological processes such as nutrient cycling, decomposition, and the nitrogen cycle, their role in environmental protection is indispensable. Beyond this, animals also contribute significantly to human well-being.
To highlight their importance and advocate for their welfare, October 4 is observed as World Animal Day. This day not only educates people about our most endangered species but also teaches how to protect and rescue them. To mark this day, people can support animal rescue shelters, launch welfare campaigns, or simply learn how to make a positive impact on animal welfare.
On this occasion, let’s delve into the history, significance, inspiring quotes and some interesting facts.
World Animal Day 2024: History
World Animal Day was first commemorated on March 24, 1925, at the Sports Palace in Berlin, Germany, thanks to the initiative of cynologist and animal protection advocate Heinrich Zimmermann. His goal was to raise awareness about animal welfare, and over 5,000 people attended to show their support for the cause.
Interestingly, World Animal Day coincides with the Feast Day of St Francis of Assisi, the patron saint of animals.
World Animal Day 2024: Significance
World Animal Day is an important occasion that serves to remind people of the ways in which animals enrich our lives. The day emphasises the need to promote the animal protection movement by encouraging the establishment of rescue shelters, launching animal welfare campaigns, raising funds and conducting awareness activities to improve animal living conditions.
Often referred to as Animal Lovers Day, this observance fosters love, care and protection for animals through the support of individuals and organizations dedicated to advocating for animal rights. Celebrating this day highlights the collective responsibility we have towards ensuring the well-being of animals.
World Animal Day 2024: Theme
The theme for this year’s World Animal Day, “The world is their home too,” highlights that animals are not just inhabitants of the earth but vital parts of our ecosystem. It emphasises their right to live in a safe and protected environment.
World Animal Day 2024: Quotes

“If a man aspires towards a righteous life, his first act of abstinence is from injury to animals.” – Albert Einstein
“An animal’s eyes have the power to speak a great language.” – Martin Buber
“When a man has pity on all living creatures, then only is he noble.” – Buddha
“He who is cruel to animals becomes hard also in his dealings with men. We can judge the heart of a man by his treatment of animals.” – Immanuel Kant
“Dogs are our link to paradise. They don’t know evil, jealousy, or discontent. To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring – it was peace.” – Milan Kundera
“Killing animals for sport, pleasure, adventure, and for hides and furs is a phenomenon that is at once disgusting and distressing. There is no justification in indulging in such acts of brutality.” – Dalai Lama
“As custodians of the planet, it is our responsibility to deal with all species with kindness, love, and compassion. That these animals suffer through human cruelty is beyond understanding. Please help to stop this madness.” – Richard Gere
“Animals are reliable, many full of love, true in their affections, predictable in their actions, grateful, and loyal. Difficult standards for people to live up to.” – Alfred A. Montapert

World Animal Day 2024: Interesting Facts

A newly born kangaroo is equal to the size of a Lima bean (it is called Sem Phali in Hindi).
Starfish don’t have a brain.
Polar bears have a black skin colour, which helps them absorb heat from the sun to stay warm in an Arctic climate. In fact, due to their transparent and hollow fur, they can sometimes appear in various colours, including yellow, grey, orange, and even green.
Greyhounds are the fastest breed of dogs who can reach a speed of 45 mph.
A 2-inch rope of spider silk is capable of stopping Boeing 747.
Zebras are one of the world’s swiftest land animalsdue to their remarkable speed and agility.
Octopuses have three hearts. Two pump blood to the gills for oxygenation, while the third pumps it to the rest of the body
Honeybees can flap their wings 200 times every second.
Horses use facial expressions to communicate with each other, such as showing teeth, flaring nostrils, and ear movements to convey emotion and intentions.
Dog’s sense of smell is approximately 1,00,000 times better than that of a human. While they have fewer taste buds than humans, their olfactory system is much more powerful.

author: world today news
title: The Importance of Being Seen: A Grandfather’s Reflection on the Power of Attention and Tenderness
text:
It is the first gesture he usually makes when he meets me and means something like “Grandpa, pick me up, hold me for a while, talk to me!”
I’m not allowed to put him down again and let him go to join the others until I’ve done that. If for some reason I don’t do it or don’t do it enough, he continues to insist or sometimes even starts to cry. Only when I have held and kissed him for a sufficient time, which is always a matter of waiting, can I let him go with confidence. Although sometimes he still comes back to me and raises his hands and I have to lift them again, shorter and shorter. This also has to be done when leaving, but it is faster because his parents then join in.
In the months that this pattern has been going on between him and me, I have often wondered what drives him and have come to the conclusion that the answer is an endearingly basic simplicity, even or especially when he comes with his 3 brothers and sister : “Grandpa, see me!”
How basic is well illustrated by what the famous British critic and (play)wright George Bernhard Shaw (1856-1950), according to many the “greatest after Shakespeare” and winner of the Nobel Prize for Literature (1925), once wrote about it: “The worst sin against our fellow human beings is not to hate them but is indifference. That is the essence of inhumanity. Indifference is saying: you don’t matter, you don’t exist for me.”
In other words, there is nothing more painful than not being seen. Nor is there anything for which we are willing to go so far as to persuade, often almost force, others to see us. That’s what I learn from my grandson. That there is nothing so important, so satisfying, so reassuring as the feeling of being seen and understood. But, the disturbing question arises, how many children are not seen, not understood?
Or to put it another way, how many children grow up without tenderness. Because tenderness is nothing other than emotional involvement and emotional care for the other. You don’t need to know psychological wisdom to be emotionally involved. You just have to be there, be present, with increased attention to what the other person is experiencing at that moment.
Shaw: “There is something about being seen that promotes growth.” In other words, if you focus the spotlight of your attention on me, I will grow. When you see me, the likelihood increases that I see myself too. But if you don’t see me, then I often don’t see myself either. And that can indeed be painful.
(respond?:
[[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection))
